p:
To determine the dose-dependent pharmacokinetic profile of H84T following a single intraperitoneal dose, groups of 44 5-wk-old male CFW mice were injected intraperitoneally on a single occasion with 5, 15, or 50 mg/kg H84T in PBS. Plasma and lung samples from multiple time points were processed and analyzed by ELISA as described in
SI Appendix .
